skincare.name: Revive Potion 3% Arbutin + Bakuchiol
skincare.description: Contains Alpha Arbutin, Bakuchiol & SabiWhite® to Maximize Brightening Result
skincare.caption: SUPERSTAR MAX BRIGHTENING SKIN RESULT A serum infused with 3 Superstar Brightening Agent that produce Maximum Brightening Result, namely Alpha Arbutin, SabiWhite®, & Bakuchiol which are able to brighten & even out skin tone without side effects. It is enhanced with Bakuchiol which is able to protect skin from pollution and free radicals, fade hyperpigmentation and prevent premature aging. #SKINSOLVER

skincare.name: Dark Spot Reducer Ampoule
skincare.caption: Dark Spot? Acne Scar? No More! PIH & PIE Targeted Treatment Ampoule that is formulated with a combination of the best ingredients & clinically tested active ingredients one of which is Tranexamoyl Dipeptide-23, functions as a double brightening effect without causing skin irritation. It is also able to even out skin tone, brighten up skin, reduce acne scars & dark spots. #SKINSOLOVER

skincare.name: Lemonade Waterless Vitamin C + Ferulic + NAG
skincare.description: Contains Ethyl Ascorbic Acid to Give Radiant Bright & Luminous Skin in 4 Weeks
skincare.caption: Potent Antioxidant Brightening Waterless Vit. C Inspired by the glowing look of Korean Glass Skin, this serum combines trio powerful brightening & antioxidant agents: Vitamin C (EAA) & NAG & Ferulic, which have a perfect synergistic effect to brighten up skin, also 67% Jeju lemon extract water which is rich in antioxidants, hence it is effective to Reduce dark spots, wrinkles & the appearance of fine lines. Equipped with Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (EAA) which has been clinically proven to be able to brighten skin in 4 weeks. Get a Fresh Juicy Glass Skin Effect like Korean celebrities. To achieve a more effective result, always use sunscreen in the morning. #SKINSOLVER
